description: [``botocore``] This release adds the INVALID_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT as a fail reason and an error message.

[``botocore``] CloudWatch Synthetics has introduced a new feature to provide customers with an option to delete the underlying resources that Synthetics canary creates when the user chooses to delete the canary.
[``botocore``] This release adds a new API called ListAssets to the Outposts SDK, which lists the hardware assets in an Outpost.
